major_arcana.name: 愚者
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 新的开始、自由精神、冒险、纯真、潜能
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 鲁莽、愚蠢、缺乏方向、草率决定
major_arcana.description: 代表人生新旅程的开始，充满无限可能性

major_arcana.name: 魔术师
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 意志力、技能、集中、创造力、行动力
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 操控、欺骗、缺乏技能、意志薄弱
major_arcana.description: 象征将想法转化为现实的能力

major_arcana.name: 女祭司
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 直觉、神秘、潜意识、智慧、内在声音
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 秘密、隐瞒、缺乏直觉、内心混乱
major_arcana.description: 代表内在智慧和直觉的力量

major_arcana.name: 皇后
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 生育力、女性气质、美丽、自然、丰富
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 依赖、空虚、缺乏成长、创意枯竭
major_arcana.description: 象征丰饶、创造力和母性

major_arcana.name: 皇帝
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 权威、结构、控制、父亲形象、稳定
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 专制、控制欲、缺乏纪律、权威失控
major_arcana.description: 代表秩序、权威和稳定的力量

major_arcana.name: 教皇
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 精神指导、传统、宗教、道德、教育
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 反叛、非传统、自由思考、限制
major_arcana.description: 象征精神导师和传统智慧

major_arcana.name: 恋人
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 爱情、关系、选择、和谐、价值观
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 分离、冲突、错误选择、不和谐
major_arcana.description: 代表爱情、选择和人际关系

major_arcana.name: 战车
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 控制、意志力、成功、决心、胜利
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 失控、缺乏方向、失败、侵略性
major_arcana.description: 象征通过意志力获得成功

major_arcana.name: 力量
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 勇气、耐心、控制、同情心、内在力量
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 弱点、自我怀疑、缺乏信心、内在恐惧
major_arcana.description: 代表内在的勇气和精神力量

major_arcana.name: 隐者
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 自省、寻找、指导、智慧、孤独
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 孤立、迷失、拒绝帮助、偏执
major_arcana.description: 象征内在探索和寻求真理

major_arcana.name: 命运之轮
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 运气、命运、变化、机会、转折点
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 厄运、失控、抗拒变化、恶性循环
major_arcana.description: 代表命运的起伏和生命的循环

major_arcana.name: 正义
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 公正、平衡、真理、法律、道德
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 不公、偏见、缺乏责任、报复
major_arcana.description: 象征公正、平衡和道德判断

major_arcana.name: 倒吊人
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 牺牲、等待、新视角、觉悟、暂停
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 拖延、抗拒、无谓牺牲、自私
major_arcana.description: 代表换个角度看问题的智慧

major_arcana.name: 死神
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 结束、转变、过渡、重生、释放
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 抗拒变化、停滞、恐惧、坚持
major_arcana.description: 象征结束和新的开始

major_arcana.name: 节制
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 平衡、和谐、耐心、修复、中庸
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 不平衡、过度、缺乏远见、冲突
major_arcana.description: 代表平衡和中庸之道

major_arcana.name: 魔鬼
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 束缚、诱惑、唯物主义、依赖、阴影
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 释放、自由、摆脱束缚、启蒙
major_arcana.description: 象征诱惑、束缚和阴影面

major_arcana.name: 塔
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 突然变化、破坏、启示、觉醒、混乱
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 恐惧变化、灾难、个人转变、延迟
major_arcana.description: 代表突然的变化和觉醒

major_arcana.name: 星星
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 希望、信仰、灵感、指引、乐观
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 绝望、缺乏信仰、消极、迷失方向
major_arcana.description: 象征希望、指引和精神启发

major_arcana.name: 月亮
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 幻象、直觉、梦境、恐惧、潜意识
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 释放恐惧、内在混乱、欺骗暴露
major_arcana.description: 代表幻象、恐惧和潜意识

major_arcana.name: 太阳
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 成功、活力、快乐、启蒙、积极
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 缺乏成功、消极、延迟快乐、自负
major_arcana.description: 象征成功、快乐和积极能量

major_arcana.name: 审判
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 重生、内在呼唤、宽恕、反思、觉醒
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 逃避责任、严厉判断、自我怀疑
major_arcana.description: 代表重生、反思和内在觉醒

major_arcana.name: 世界
major_arcana.upright_meaning: 完成、成就、旅程结束、满足、成功
major_arcana.reversed_meaning: 缺乏完整、停滞、缺乏目标、延迟
major_arcana.description: 象征完成、成就和圆满

wands.reversed_meaning: 缺乏能量、延迟、错失机会

wands.reversed_meaning: 缺乏计划、恐惧未知、控制欲
